item.title: 8.3 Export Option for Access Control
item.description: 8.3 Export Option for Access Control Permission control through Export Option setting Move to the detail screen of the file system created earlier. Click Export created in the Export list as shown in the figure below. At the bottom of the Export detail screen, NFS Export Options are displayed as shown in the figure. The default created option is accessible as Read/Write from all clients (0.0.0.0/0). Click Edit NFS Export Options.
